11030000.text:
[Recommended Level] 33
Hope? Is this child worried about her sister who hasn't come home?

She looks really worried. I should find out what's going on.

11030001.text:
[Recommended Level] 30
He's worried about a colleague in the East Ecological Research Site? Because of a monster called "Baphomet?" The name makes it sound pretty terrifying. If that's the case, of course he'd be worried.

Go to the East Ecological Research Site and hear out the colleague.

11030002.text:
[Recommended Level] 32
Because the Greenhorns constantly eat up all the grains, times are tough. Maybe even tough enough to give up farming entirely. If the Greenhorns consume everything, there's really nothing farmers can do.

Let's hear more about the situation first. I can't give them a good answer, though... I think it's better to go to the Sol Seekers or Plum Blossom and ask if there's any good solution for this.

11030003.text:
[Recommended Level] 37
I'm glad they said they won't give up farming. However, they can't manage the farm equipment because they don't have the proper materials. They're thinking of risking their lives to go to the beach and look for some...

Since I'm good at eliminating enemies, maybe I can help?

11030004.text:
[Recommended Level] 34
The Sol Seekers Manager Ko Gondae seems to be dissatisfied with his jurisdiction. I don't know what I can do about the Sol Seekers' jurisdiction, but...

I think I can help out in getting rid of the coastal creatures that suddenly increased in number.

11030005.text:
[Recommended Level] 35
Soon Nubi of the Sol Seekers misses the old days when she spent quality time at the beach. After the Oduksinis took over the beach, her relaxing days at the beach came to an end.

Should I go to the beach first and check how many Oduksinis there are? I might be able to get rid of them if there aren't too many.

11030006.text:
[recommended level]>40
The blue man bandit gang that has recently made a name for itself with the spear gang. Recently, the leader of the maehwa gang, Hong Maehwa, has a headache because of the spear. In the southern part of the shade forest, there are reports that it is set up in a place now called the Blood Forest and attacks not only the expedition team but also passersby.

Red plum blossoms wanting to borrow even a Barongson. He seems to need a helping hand.

11030100.text:
[Recommended Level] 44
Snake expert Sa Gilmi is developing medicine for those who die of poisoning from Snakecaps. I should lend a helping hand for the greater good, right?

Since I can't take the poison from the Snakecaps myself, let me catch them and bring them to her.

11030101.text:
[Recommended Level] 45
Apparently, a colleague at the Pioneers' Graveyard came face to face with an actual ghost and decided to quit right then and there. What kind of ghost could have appeared?

Go to the Pioneers' Graveyard and talk to the managers. They might know something helpful.

11030102.text:
[Recommended Level] 47
Ivory Gale's Bi Ruha suddenly appeared and suggested that we go to see flowers together. What's he up to? I can't say no to someone that needs my help...

I guess I'll start by eliminating the enemies around the flowers. Is this why he asked me to lend a hand?

11030103.text:
[Recommended Level] 41
The Sol Seekers soldier is very angry. He has a lot of hatred for the Scarlet Masks. Is this just his personal resentment? He says he can move the troops if he knows the exact location of the Scarlet Masks' base.

I can't get rid of all the Scarlet Masks, but I can find out their location. Let's see if there are any bases around while I deal with them.

11030104.text:
[Recommended Level] 43
A Baron of the Soul Bridge suddenly looks at me and gets angry, saying that I'm late. Did I do something wrong? I wanted to hear more, but he just stormed off toward the swamp.

I'd feel bad if something happened... Isn't the swamp dangerous? It'd be a big deal if he ended up getting hurt.

Let's go after him so I can talk to the Baron and resolve this misunderstanding.

11030105.text:
[Recommended Level] 43
Kuku was kind enough to explain about the Illusion Giant Mantis that appears here, even though I politely refused.

Since I'm already here, let's keep Kuku safe and listen to his story. I should start by getting rid of the Illusion Mantises around us. If I knew it would be so annoying, I shouldn't have come here.

Better just finish what I started.

11030106.text:
[Recommended Level] 47
A passerby suddenly asked for directions. He wants to go to the Magnificent Hillside... But wait, we're on our way to Caelite Land, which is in the opposite direction.

To go in the direction of the Foggy Forest Settlement, we should go to the swamp first, but there are a lot of enemies on the way. If I were alone, I could just avoid them, but...

I need to get rid of the enemies and open a path for him.

11030107.text:
[Recommended Level] 42
Jang Minei of the Sol Seekers had a strange experience while patrolling recently. She greeted Horyong of the Peach Blossom and Moonwind of Soul Steel, but when she looked closely, they were illusions. After that, she was no longer willing to venture into the Shadowed Mistwood...

I can't help her forget, but I can do something so that she doesn't have to repeat this experience.

11030108.text:
[recommended level]>42
The central passageway of Taerok Forest, the shadowy forest and the dry marsh where you can gather good quality soil, both are famous areas for ghosts. There is always danger. The workers of Dohwasangjeon were risking their work here. In the end, some workers seem to say that they can't do their job at all.

The sad boss Ho-ryong Kwak tried to solve this problem, but there was one big problem. There seems to be a problem...

11030109.text:
[Recommended Level]>44
A terrified Barong is stomping his feet at the entrance to the Pioneer Memorial Cemetery. He seems worried about the Barongs who came together to gather herbs. In fact, the other Barongs take care of themselves to avoid the monsters and take medicinal herbs. I'm digging well, but I'm very worried about the cowardly Mumu.

But what can I do for the cute Barong Mumu? Let's listen to Mumu's story.

11030110.text:
[recommended level]>46
President of the Wildlife Conservation Society of Suwol Plains, Gray Wind visited for a while to see the scenery of the sea and moon continent, but was stunned. Even the target they are poaching is said to be a protected species, Sanseonho.

You can feel the boiling rage of the Ashen Wind up to here. Poaching, stop!

11030200.text:
[Recommended Level] 52
I can see someone standing dangerously near the waterfall. Or... is it? No way, I'm seeing things, right?

...Just in case, let's go take a look.

11030201.text:
[Recommended Level] 49
A Sol Seeker became so discouraged by his mission that I heard he even prepared his will. Apparently he's tasked with observing Ape King Ogong. Is that really so dangerous?

Let's hear more from the recruit next to me. Observing Ape King Ogong seems more interesting than dangerous...

11030202.text:
[Recommended Level] 49
Knott Mee of the Sol Seekers is tired of regularly having to deal with the Bulbaries. The Ape King Ogong monitoring mission isn't something that can just be ignored. The Sol Seekers really are stretched pretty thin.

I won't be able to help them out a lot, but wouldn't they appreciate it if I eliminate the Bulbaries?

11030203.text:
[Recommended Level] 50
Quisby of the Sol Seekers is worried that Dokumo might come out of its nest. That Dokumo sounds pretty dangerous.

It might be helpful if I defeat nearby enemies, check if Dokumo has left its nest, and then report the situation.

11030204.text:
[Recommended Level] 51
Lang Lang of the Soul Bridge needs more moss to make his medicine. I just need to get the moss from the Tree Spirits near Sunrise Climb? That shouldn't be too difficult... Should I help?

Go to the Sunrise Climb and defeat the Tree Spirits. Since he needs a large quantity of moss, I might have to defeat a lot of them.

11030205.text:
[recommended level]>49
Somewhere there seems to be a sound of steel fists sighing as if the ground is about to go extinct. Steel fists... Apparently he is playing a major role in the Geumgyeongcheolmun Gate, but something is lacking. And this time The job must also be related to the moonlight...? It's clear that he has a crush on him!

Still, I don't hate him. Let's listen to his earnest voice.

11030206.text:
[Recommended Level]>51
Since the Taerok Forest was pioneered, a sunrise event hosted by Dohwasangjeon has been held every year on the Sunrise Slope. It is inconvenient to plant Myomyeons there because there are too many people. Ho-ryong Kwak, the master of the department, wants to at least push them away from the passageway, although the rapprochement has failed.

Will the push-out strategy work as Kwak Ho-ryong thinks?

11030207.text:
[recommended level]>49
The Black Dawn, an unidentified group that attacks the sect that worships the divine beast. This includes Ereda and Pungbaekmun, which we are familiar with. Lately, I have doubts about the Black Dawn's rapid expansion. 

But the urgent fire is right in front of the Black Dawn's troops! Let's help Oreum defeat the Black Dawn.

11030208.text:
[Recommended level] 30
Luru, a young teacher I met at Yedohang. His appearance and tone were quite different from those of other young teachers, Barong. He spoke as if he knew me, and it was a bit suspicious...

11031000.text:
[Recommended Level] 33
Hope? Is this child worried about her sister who hasn't come home? She looks really worried. I should find out what's going on.

I should listen to his story... Maybe even help if he has a problem.

11031001.text:
[Recommended Level] 30
He's worried about a colleague in the East Ecological Research Site? Because of a monster called "Baphomet?" The name makes it sound pretty terrifying. If that's the case, of course he'd be worried. Go to the East Ecological Research Site and hear out the colleague.

11031208.text:
[Recommended level] 30
Luru, a young teacher I met at Yedohang. The way I look and the way I speak, I look very different from other young teachers, Barong. It seems that I am desperately looking for someone…

Eh? Am I the person I am looking for?

11034500.text:
[Recommended Level] 40 
 Affiliated rain forests, I met the Brother of the Sportsmen in the way to go to the rainforest base. 
 Waiting for someone, and what happens to see what's in the hand, I looked at it, what, what?! That's his eyes! 
 Machi looks well with the expression that you met you well, and looks like a look. 
 

 Would not it be a troublesome thing ...?

11034501.text: [Recommended Level] 40 \n Embroidery Won Bhil Ruru showed a failure hourglass in his hand and asked it to fix it. He said that the hourglass was not already able to see that the hourglass could not be able to do not have to be able to do not already be hand, Why is a sad feeling wrong?
